instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00928 - 20v only turn on with charger
threads.message:
with out battery i get 19.7v  and it goes up to 1.20a i get fan spin for 7 seconds then 19.9v oA i press power button and it does all over again
with battery 19.7 2.10A and it turns on everything works battery charging i can unplug charger everything ok if i close lid and open screen will not come on the keyboard
still light up i hear keys being press i press power button will not shut off
 i test smc_onoff_L 3.3V
I TRIED WORKING SCREEN
I PUT ANOTHER board in and everything works

threads.title: 820-00928 - 20v only turn on with charger
threads.message: Check SMC_LID_LEFT/RIGHT signals, when the problem appears.

threads.title: 820-00928 - 20v only turn on with charger
threads.message:
when screen is on smc_lid_left is 1.4v and smc_lid_right is 3.5v
when screen is off  smc_lid_left is 1.6v and smc_lid_right is 3.5v 
when the screen is on i put a magnet to J5260 the HALL_SENSOR_RIGHT AND IT TURNS OFF
when i do the same to J5250 the HALL_SENSOR_left  it doesn't  TURNS OFF

threads.title: 820-00928 - 20v only turn on with charger
threads.message:
So you have problems with left sensor (J5250); you should change it.
A fast workaround is removing R5252 and joining pins 1/2 of U5255.

threads.title: 820-00928 - 20v only turn on with charger
threads.message: i replace the sensor   AND IT WORKS THANK
